desc: A delightful vanilla cappuccino with a dash of cinnamon on the top, ask your barista for foam art!
a smooth caffeinated drink, using imported colombian beans. Pick your choice of caffeinated or decaf, with plenty of toppings!
A frappuccino made with our barrista's secret recipe from Italy! Flavors include chocolate, vanilla, and caramel. Watch out for matcha flavor coming next year!
Vanilla icecream with coffee, a perfect treat for the summer, be sure to ask for a spoon, it can get messy!
Our in house recipe, hot cocoa in either white chocolate or dark chocolate.
A soothing cup of tea, served ice or hot, with plenty of flavors. Ask for our specialties of plain tea or matcha green tea!
A soothing cup of tea, served ice or hot, with plenty of flavors. Ask for our specialties of plain tea or matcha green tea!
House mocha with a shot of expresso or without. A splendid chocolate flavor that comes with your preferred drizzle of caramel or chocolate. Watch out for white mocha coming next Fall!
